docs.title: Getting Start
docs.text:
The problem is not the students. The problem is how we teach them.

tenko is a tool help you get better score at school. for student in

  • Tankang University
  • Fu Jen Catholic University
  • Asia University

more coming Soon

docs.title: UV setup
docs.text:
this project use uv, so you need to install it first

for Mac, Linux

curl -LsSf https://astral.sh/uv/install.sh | sh

or

curl -LsSf https://astral.sh/uv/0.9.13/install.sh | sh

for Windows

powershell -ExecutionPolicy ByPass -c "irm https://astral.sh/uv/install.ps1 | iex"

docs.title: Run
docs.text:
uv sync
source .venv/bin/activate
uv run main.py

you can setup a .env files to save your time

docs.title: Deploy as a single executable.
docs.text:
we use pyinstaller to package this to a single executable.

uv run pyinstaller --name tenko --onefile --console main.py

inside tenko.spec

# -*- mode: python ; coding: utf-8 -*-


a = Analysis(
    ['main.py'],
    pathex=['.'],
    binaries=[],
    datas=[],
    hiddenimports=[],
    hookspath=[],
    hooksconfig={},
    runtime_hooks=[],
    excludes=[],
    noarchive=False,
    optimize=0,
)
pyz = PYZ(a.pure)

exe = EXE(
    pyz,
    a.scripts,
    a.binaries,
    a.datas,
    [],
    name='tenko',
    debug=False,
    bootloader_ignore_signals=False,
    strip=False,
    upx=True,
    upx_exclude=[],
    runtime_tmpdir=None,
    console=True,
    disable_windowed_traceback=False,
    argv_emulation=False,
    target_arch=None,
    codesign_identity=None,
    entitlements_file=None,
)

then run

uv run pyinstaller --log-level=DEBUG tenko.spec
